description: Detects changes to the ClickOnce trust prompt registry key in order to enable an installation from different locations such as the Internet.
author: @SerkinValery
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: ClickOnce Trust Prompt Tampering
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\SOFTWARE\\MICROSOFT\\.NETFramework\\Security\\TrustManager\\PromptingLevel\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Internet OR *\\LocalIntranet OR *\\MyComputer OR *\\TrustedSites OR *\\UntrustedSites) AND winlog.event_data.Details:"Enabled")
